long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Acta365Classrom extension will provide help to teachers, so they can manage educational urls for their classrooms, allowing teachers to send educational urls in real time, as well as displaying information to the students, regarding the assigned subjects given by the teacher.

Acta365Classroom offers a range of powerful tools to help teachers and students while in a class session:

• Teachers can send urls to their students in real time, automatically displaying urls sent by the teacher.

• Teachers will be able to receive all the progress of the amount of time spent on the educational urls sent.

• Students get to see the schedule assigned by the teacher of the current iteration of their class.

• Students can determine the amount of time they have been studying each subject (url) sent by the teacher.

This chrome extension is dedicated to be used as part of the Acta365 solution for Education, for more information:
https://www.actacom.nl/ict-oplossingen/acta365/
